was wondering if there is anything besides the panasonic or Olympus that is=
 equally good

--- On Mon, 1/10/11, vortex6066 <vortex6066@...> wr=
ote:


From: vortex6066 <vortex6066@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: An=
other Recorder---Panasonic RR-QR200
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monda=
y, January 10, 2011, 3:24 PM


=C2=A0 



I dont know of any specific alter=
natives to the Panasonics.
Ive got a QR100 and 200, but I did buy an Olympu=
s DS-40 a while back. Not as good as the QR's but it does get evps.
A guide=
line I can suggest is to look for older recorders that dont have USB (earph=
one jack only, like the QR's). The older recorders are more likely to have =
codecs that are less efficient at conversion, subsequently generate artifac=
ts, and therefore more likely to be better at evp.
Good luck Urs.
JEFF

---=

d 200 were the only ones that had a codec similar to the earlier DR60. I wo=
uldnt bother therefore with any later Panasonics than the QR200. If you can=
 get a 100, its almost identical, except it has less memory (recording time=
).
> JEFF
